structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ORGANIZATION AND GOVERNMENT OF CITIES OF THE SECOND CLASS (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 434, sec. 15. -- Repealed in part 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 29. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3106, 3107.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Mayor -- Election -- Term -- Qualifications -- Ineligible for succeeding term.
